turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order a coffee for pickup at a Starbucks in Tustin, California, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a caramel macchiato, venti with nonfat milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: caramel machiato it is! what size would you like that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, venti caramel machiato, with nonfat milk. where would you like to pickup your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the Starbucks on El Camino Real place.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it! your coffee will be ready to be picked up at the starbucks at el camino real in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. I appreciate it. Thank you.
